title: Physiotherapy
description: Personalized treatment plans to restore movement, reduce pain, and improve function.

consultations.title: Follow-up
consultations.details: A follow-up appointment includes a re-assessment and progression of rehab exercises.
consultations.idealFor: Ongoing treatment and rehabilitation to support your recovery

consultations.title: Online appointment
consultations.details: Remote video consultations via secure telehealth link.

consultations.title: Pro-Athlete Assessment
consultations.details: Comprehensive injury assessment with manual therapy and rehab plan.
consultations.idealFor: Professional athletes needing advanced sports-based physiotherapy.

title: Sports Injuries
description: Specialized care for athletes to recover from injuries and return to peak performance.

consultations.title: Acute Injury Care
consultations.details: Immediate treatment for sprains, strains, and fractures.

consultations.title: Chronic Injury Management
consultations.details: Long-term management of overuse and recurring injuries.

consultations.title: Functional Training
